-e ---

𓅱 𓏲 𐀸 𒌋 𒑱 𒉼 ω 𒉿 •wm Ω 𓍶

𓅱 𓍢 𓏲 •wound 'و' wa in arabic is 'und' in German.

𒌑 𒌋 wa=und : wound 𓏲 (plural)

𒑱 𒉿 WA,WE,WI < 𒉼

w- 𐀷 wa 𐀸 we 𐀹 wi 𐀺 wo Ϝ ϝ wau W- 𐘮 WA 𐘽•WR 𐘣 WI _ WO / WU

𓌉 white > letter waw 𓎘 𓎗 Y 𐤅 ו 𐡅 V vs Y 𐩺 YODH vs P ᚹ ƿ vs 𓏲 ﻭ ܘ 𐩥 vs qoph 𓎗 𐩤

IPA Pronunciations /w/ /ʊ/ /β/ /ʋ/ /v/ /ɔ/

Whenever egyptologists write 'w' you should rather read 'vu' 'u' 'un' 'en' (+d)

All being the essence of
𓏲 wound WN < BN bend
𓏲 whirl WR
𓍢 round RN

𓏲 ⻙ wéi wool woll-weich
𓏲 ⻙ wéi Faden web 🕸 pu 蹼
𓏲 围 wei wheel < wehr 危 ⻙ 卫 囗
𓏲 尾 wei wedel weTail 包 wuschel < Büschel 把 bǎ
𓏲 wéi < 百 bǎi 100 hundred 百 ≈ 一 白 yī baí Wende: 60-120 days? 巴 bā 包 bao vs 巳㔾sì/seal/jie 阝
把 bǎ bar/bunch/bind/bush/büschel

𓊪 pool 白 bái fort warka 囗 wéi wehr 维 < QWR
囗 wéi Weide 伟 wei wide 纬 Weite 巍薇微 weī µ

𐤅 Waw half vowel װ vav w Ⱳ ⱳ Ꝡ ꝡ mwit ʍ ɯ ɰ ʷ ẃ Ẁ ẁ Ŵ ŵ Ẅ ẅ Ẇ ẇ Ẉ ẉ ẘ IPA Ϝ fuckup
